page.description: Finds the date for the 'n'th day in a month. e.g. the 4th Thursday for November in 2005
page.syntax: Formatted_Date as C = nth_dow(C dayName ,N month ,N year ,N occurrence )

argument.name: dayName
argument.description: Case insensitive English name or abbreviation for the day of the week.

page.discussion: NTH_DOW() returns the date for the Nth occurrence of the specified day of the week starting in the specified month and year.
